Text.Page:
[Urgent Letter from the Mysterium]

, it's Ryshan.

The Mysterium has decided to take action on the three towers.

But we know so little about the argons, we must be cautious of every action. There were even reports that the tower itself might be an argon.

The Mysterium is counting on you, . Go to {@creature:246#2001$$Adeldur} at the research base.

The federation promised us full support. Please help us.

â€”Ryshan"Consider it done."
